title: please fix the the ping issue
body:
Ive never left a match of Lol [not that Ive been playing particularly long] until 2 nights ago but the ping was abysmal at times. My average ping is 29.78  but recently lol has been having massive pings spike from 28 to 1000. I called my network administrator and even had 2 separate representatives come to my home to make sure there is nothing wrong with my connection. The issue appears to be server side and my is an alien were area 51 [4 months old]

replies.body:
Sucks to have your 'not leaving' streak end because of a technical problem, but I appreciate you taking initiative looking for a fix like you did. :)

Currently, NA's not received any reports about connection interference server-side, but in the event you ever think it is you can always check the [**Server Status**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) to verify that.

You ISP is probably not having any outages either, however if you're being routed in a certain way that can cause packet loss and ping spikes with your connection. Go ahead and check out our [**Log Reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader), plug your logs into that and take a screen shot of the readings for me. That should help identify any packet loss you're experiencing.
